meanings.sent1: She sang loudlier than anyone else in the choir.
meanings.sent2: Please speak loudlier so everyone can hear you.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed loudlier than the dog, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The thunder roared loudlier than a lion in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The alarm blared loudlier than ever before, waking up the entire neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: He cheered loudlier than anyone at the game.
meanings.sent2: The music played loudlier as the party went on.
meanings.sent3: The teacher clapped loudlier than the students, showing her enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: Her heart beat loudlier with each passing moment of suspense.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks exploded loudlier than the cheers of the crowd, lighting up the night sky.
